sentences.sContent: That first citation is from 1557 and comes to us from a great navigator and map maker of the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: That first citation is from 1557 and comes to us from a great navigator and map maker of the time.
sentences.sCn: 这第一条引证出自1557年，而且它还将一位当时伟大的航海家和地理绘图者带入我们的视野。

synos.tran: 航海家；[航][水运]领航员；驾驶员

phrases.pCn: 网景领航员（浏览器名称）

words.tran: 可航行的；可驾驶的；适于航行的
驾驶，操纵；使通过；航行于
